doc.title: Poultry in Motion
doc.plot: Poultry in Motion Is a comedy about three separate guys who walk into a corner-shop at different intervals during the day. The difference is that they are all dressed in chicken suits and the shop itself is being held up by a blind man. The first "chicken" enters looking for cigarettes, the second enters looking for sweets for his children and the third enters in an attempt to rescue his blind friend who has made a balls of his robbery attempt.
